how_to.title: How does it work?
how_to.body: With ATUA, you can earn money renting your car while you are on vacation or when you are not using your car. We provide SURA insurance to guarantee a safe trip.

big_letters.first: Leave your car to us in the airport while you travel.
big_letters.third: Contact other people and rent your car while you don't use it.

insurance.title: You are covered
insurance.body: For thos cars in our concessionaires.

first.title: All risk coverage
first.body: The franchise is up to who rents.

second.title: Inmediate
second.body: If your car passes verification, it will be insured.
